title: Executive Order 5906-Modification of Reservoir-Site Reserve No. 17, Pacific Slope Basins, California
content: The Executive order of June 8, 1926, creating Reservoir-Site Reserve No. 17, is hereby modified to the extent of authorizing the Federal Power Commission to issue a license for Project No. 1209 on the following-described lands on condition that whenever the lands are required for reservoir purposes the licensee agrees at its own expense to remove its project works from said lands or from such portions thereof as may be required for reservoir purposes within 30 days after the receipt of notice from the Secretary of the Interior:

All portions of the following sections lying within 25 feet of the center line of the transmission-line location shown on a map designated "Exhibit K," and entitled "Electric Distribution Line along West Fork of San Gabriel River," and filed in the office of the Federal Power Commission May 17, 1932:
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5906-Modification of Reservoir-Site Reserve No. 17, Pacific Slope Basins, California Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/361488
